short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visually shows 100% sustainable regions in your Cloud Console e.g. AWS. Supports the Sustainable Servers by 2024 initiative.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View which regions are sustainable in a cloud provider. Use visual cues to see which of the regions a provider gives you are powered by renewable or sustainable energy and which are not.

In support of the Sustainable Servers by 2024 petition: https://www.change.org/p/sustainable-servers-by-2024

Read the whitepaper to find out more: https://bit.ly/2024wp

Extension is not intended to be more than an information extension. 

Tweet to @PaulDJohnston if you want help with it or have any suggestions. No guarantees anything will get done though (you have been warned).
